snippet: Technically gray/roan, Hansen, a Kentucky Derby contender, is nearly all white, and attracting fans because of the romanticism attached to horses of his color.
abstract: Hansen, 2011 Breeders' Cup Juvenile champion, is one of the leading contenders for the 2012 Kentucky Derby; technically gray or roan, the 2-year-old thoroughbred looks all white, and is attracting fans because of the romanticism attached to horses of his color.
lead_paragraph: Technically gray/roan, Hansen, a Kentucky Derby contender, is nearly all white, and attracting fans because of the romanticism attached to horses of his color.

headline.main: Derby Dreams Ride In on a White Horse
